comment._content:
Diving *and* smoking?
That's gotta be tricky.

comment.author: 10199807@N00
comment._content: I can guess this is most likely from the Tarpon Springs area, as they were the sponge diving capital of the world. The sponge docks along the Anclote river are famous, and to this day still have divers in such suits.

comment.author: 36373517@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/lapstrake] Actually Tarpon Springs is the biggest in the USA.  Sponges are also found all around Greece and the Mediterranean, also in Australia even.  But not the biggest in the world.
